name: Unchained
title: What’s Next for Sony’s L2?
text:
Synopsis
Sonum is developing a comprehensive entertainment ecosystem built on a financial infrastructure, with plans to launch entertainment initiatives leveraging intellectual property across music, movies, and gaming in the coming months.

Key Insights
- The project aims to create an entertainment layer for the next internet
- Financial infrastructure is considered a critical foundation for the entertainment layer
- Upcoming launch of a main platform focusing on the finance layer
- Plans to develop entertainment initiatives in collaboration with various companies
- Specific entertainment sectors of focus include:
  - Idol groups
  - Music
  - Movies
  - Gaming
- Multiple campaigns and collaborations are planned for the incoming weeks and months
